content: प्रस्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Going to, visiting, abiding in; as in वानप्रस्थ. {@--2@} Going on a journey. {@--3@} Spreading, expanding. {@--4@} Firm, stable. --स्थः, --स्थं {@--1@} A level expanse, level plain; as in ओषधिप्रस्थ, इंद्रप्रस्थ &c. {@--2@} Table-land on the top of a mountain; प्रस्थं हिमाद्रेर्मृगनाभिगंधि किंचित् क्वणतकिन्नरमध्युवास <ls>Ku. 1. 54</ls>; <ls>Me. 58.</ls> {@--3@} The top or peak of a mountain; <ls>Śi. 4. 11</ls> (where it has sense 4 also). {@--4@} A particular measure of capacity equal to thirty-two {%palas%}. {@--5@} Anything measuring a {%Prastha%}.
